General.Name: Financiere Marjos SA
General.Description: Financière Marjos SA, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the creation, installation, acquisition, and operation of various companies in France and internationally. The company's portfolio includes manufacturing, sales, rental, and maintenance companies. The company was formerly known as Clayeux SA and changed its name to Financière Marjos SA. The company is headquartered in Paris, France.
